## onElementAdded() function

Create an observer that will wait for specific elements to be added to the DOM later, optionally filtered by CSS selectors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function onElementAdded<T extends keyof HTMLElementTagNameMap>(tagName: T, callback: (element: HTMLElementTagNameMap[T]) => void, options?: OnElementAddedOptions): void;
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td><td>

</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
